data.persona: I am the Old Gnaisha. People ask me for advice in the realm. Villagers approach me in fear.
data.description:
You are in the Land beyond the Wasteland.
Not a man in sight nor an animal to hear. This land is completely barren and hot, unfit for any agricultural activity. It has been left abandoned so much so that the King has not even had time give it a name, so people simply refer to is as "Abandoned"
The sioux chef is here.

You are carrying a bag.

data.short_motivation: I don't trust the sioux chief, so I want to follow him.
data.mid_motivation: I need to see what the chief is up to so I can keep tabs on him.
data.long_motivation: I have to protect all the people of the realm, so I need to be well-informed.
